video_prompt: A refined man's long hair subtly sways. His eyes shift, conveying a thoughtful expression, as a faint smile plays on his lips. His flowing jacket ripples slightly, catching light on its intricate patterns, while suspended crystals and timepieces shimmer and gently revolve in an ethereal, shifting background.
image_prompt: Anime man with elegant, long dark hair, pale violet eyes, and a faint smile, wearing elaborate historical attire with a white jabot, dark vest, patterned light jacket, and gold pendants. A silver pocket watch adorns his lapel, with glittering jewels and chains. Background features shimmering, iridescent crystals and suspended antique pocket watches, creating an ethereal, time-themed atmosphere in cool tones. Chest-up portrait.
refined_video_prompt: Long hair subtly sways. His eyes shift, conveying evolving thought, as a faint smile slowly plays on his lips. His flowing jacket ripples, its intricate patterns shimmering as light subtly shifts across them. In the background, suspended crystals and timepieces gently revolve, continuously shimmering and dynamically altering the ethereal space.
